A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This is a complete and utter abomination. Disney has completely ruined the imagination and wonder of my childhood with lens flare\, galaxy-center black hole sized plot holes\, forced and contrived "diversity" (Admiral Gebder Studies\, anyone) ridiculous left wing political moralizing (in space Las Vegas\, the rich get richer an the poor poorer! ) and the oh-so-obvious "Everyone in the First order is a straight white male and everyone in the Resistance is a Dominican woman with poofy hair" dogshit.

FUCK you Disney. You dumped the EU\, with its myriad authors and massive story that spans millennia\, for THIS? FOR LUKE SKYWALKER JERKING OFF A SEA COW? 

Seriously\, die in fire.
